MINING_HEAD_DESCRIPTION:
Development for mining platforms, for convenient monitoring and collecting 
 statistics of mining processes, which allows you to view the structure and 
 financial results of a mining pool, information about input and output operations
of funds, and receive detailed information about the status of a mining pool.
MINING_BENEFITS_1_DESCRIPTION: Monitoring the investment program in real time, viewing the history of operations.
MINING_BENEFITS_2_DESCRIPTION: Scalability, high load, data security. A policy for distributing data access rights ensures their security.
MINING_BENEFITS_3_DESCRIPTION: Adaptive design, the ability to customize the platform for different types of customers.
MINING_BENEFITS_4_DESCRIPTION: Payments are controlled by a separate system, facilitating regular and quick payments.
MINING_BENEFITS_5_DESCRIPTION: Possibility to integrate bots for convenient notification of found blocks, payments.
MINING_BENEFITS_6_DESCRIPTION: Trust is the foundation of successful cryptocurrency projects.
MINING_WORK_PROCESS:
We believe in the convenience of simple solutions. Using mining pools should be
as easy as sending an emoticon. Maximum functionality. Even the standard 
mining pool offers the client many features. Mining should be 
comfortable, useful, affordable and well protected.
ECOMMERCE_HEAD_DESCRIPTION:
Development for online stores and marketplaces, in which the entire 
 necessary set of functions has been thought out, which can be easily and quickly integrated into the 
IT current landscape and business processes. Interface solutions adapted for 
design of the system and guidelines of commercial systems.
ECOMMERCE_BENEFITS_1_DESCRIPTION: A set of convenient solutions for marketplaces and online stores.
ECOMMERCE_BENEFITS_3_DESCRIPTION: UX / UI interface - quick access to products.
ECOMMERCE_BENEFITS_5_DESCRIPTION: Ability to integrate with major commercial systems.
ECOMMERCE_WORK_PROCESS:
We believe in the convenience of simple solutions. Using marketplaces should be as easy
as easy as sending an emoticon. Maximum functionality. Even the standard
online store offers a lot of functions to the customer. Marketplace should be
convenient, useful, affordable and well protected.
FREELANCE_HEAD_DESCRIPTION:
Development of freelance platforms for effective interaction between
the customer and the executor. We are for a successful business. That's why we created a 
 product that includes the tools and metrics necessary for 
effective marketing and communications.
FREELANCE_BENEFITS_1_DESCRIPTION: Detailed reports provide an understanding of the needs of the target audience and create effective communication channels.
FREELANCE_BENEFITS_2_DESCRIPTION: Scalability, high load, data security. A policy for distributing data access rights ensures their security.
FREELANCE_BENEFITS_3_DESCRIPTION: Ready UI / UX interface, which is adapted for all devices, which allows you to comfortably interact with all participants in the transaction.
FREELANCE_BENEFITS_4_DESCRIPTION: The data warehouse standardizes and stores data from various sources, facilitating the consolidation and integration of all data.
FREELANCE_BENEFITS_5_DESCRIPTION: Ability to integrate with major commercial systems.
FREELANCE_WORK_PROCESS:
We believe in the convenience of simple solutions. Using freelance platforms should be
as easy as sending a smile. Maximum functionality. Even the 
standard freelance marketplace offers the client many features. Freelance 
should be convenient, useful, affordable and well protected.
